title: Location, Community, Quality Living. It Starts Here!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 914 Sq.
Stylish apartment living for both the start-up and the start-something-new crowds, the Main Street Cupertino Lofts offers a unique and fresh way to Simplify Your Life.
At the Main Street Cupertino Lofts, a community of studio and one bedroom apartments, you'll enjoy purpose-built and ironically styled apartments befitting of the tech-friendly area.
In addition to the ample amenities and trending conveniences throughout, you'll take advantage of immediate access to shopping and dining.

Patio or Balcony*, Washers and Dryers in every unit, Stainless Steel Appliances, Vaulted ceilings with floor to ceiling windows*, Modern Kitchens with Jenn-Air appliances/gas stoves, High End Finishes, Walk-in closets*, Live-Work Lofts, Built in dishwashers, Hardwood Style Flooring, Quartz Countertops

Wine Lockers, On-Site Retail, Dry Cleaning Service, On-Site Management, Lush Social Courtyards, Club Room, Coffee Wi-Fi Lounge, Package Concierge, Bike Lockers, Two levels of underground parking with electric car chargers, Fitness Center, Outdoor Terrace + Grill, Walkable Town-Square Community
Pet Friendly (Some breed and weight restrictions apply)
